title: How to Disband a Guild on World of Warcraft

steps.title: Confirm that you want your guild gone.
steps.content: Confirm that you want your guild gone. Make sure that you are absolutely positively sure you want to disband your guild, though.

steps.title: A message will appear that says your guild has been disbanded.
steps.content: A message will appear that says your guild has been disbanded. You will no longer be the owner of a guild.
